history.proof: intros u v w H1 H2. apply orthogonal_sym in H1. hauto use: transitive, colineaire_modulo_pi, permute, orthogonal_sym unfold: double, orthogonal, colineaire.

ctx: intros u v w H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: apply (v_trans v w u) in H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment u, v, w : V H1 : orthogonal v u H2 : colineaire v w The term "v" has type "V" while it is expected to have type "vR ?u ?v".

ctx: intros u v w H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall u v : V, orthogonal u v -> orthogonal v u" on hypothesis of type "colineaire v w".

ctx: intros u v w H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: apply (Double_permute (cons v w) (cons u v) (cons u w) H2).
exceptions.exn: The reference Double_permute was not found in the current environment.

original: intros u v w H1 H2. apply orthogonal_sym in H1. apply (v_trans v w u) in H2. apply orthogonal_sym in H2. apply (Double_permute (cons v w) (cons u v) (cons u w) H2).
